title: Hey I found a temporary fix for the infinite login bug.
body:
Set your system clock back two days and re-open the client. A few friends and I were able to get back in. 

Hopefully this works for the rest of y'all till Riot comes through with a bug fix.

replies.body: Thanks a bunch, i was finally able to log in

> [{quoted}](name=xTh3Weatherman,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lPiHEqwp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-12T18:35:43.061+0000)
>
> Thanks a bunch, i was finally able to log in

No problem! i know people wanna play on the weekend.
Do that then see what happens to your other games!
